title: Lenny Kravitz - Let Love Rule (Justice Remix)
content: I love this [video](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074259/http:/vimeo.com/6946981), directed by [Keith Schofield](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019074259/http:/keithschofield.com/). Justice is the French duo formerly known with their previous great _typographical_ video, DVNO.
author: mk2
